import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PaginatedTable=_ref=>{let{data,columns,itemsPerPage=10}=_ref;const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState(1);// Function to format date
const formatDate=dateString=>{if(!dateString)return'';// Eğer T yoksa, ekle
let isoString=dateString.includes('T')?dateString:dateString.replace(' ','T');const date=new Date(isoString);if(isNaN(date.getTime()))return String(dateString);// Geçersizse raw göster
const day=String(date.getDate()).padStart(2,'0');const month=String(date.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0');const year=date.getFullYear();return"".concat(day,"/").concat(month,"/").concat(year);};// Pagination logic
const getPaginatedData=()=>{const startIndex=(currentPage-1)*itemsPerPage;const endIndex=startIndex+itemsPerPage;return data.slice(startIndex,endIndex);};// Make Heading In UpperCase
var mainHead=[];columns.forEach(item=>{var final_head;if(item==='created_at'||item==='created'){final_head='Created';}else if(item==='voucher_booking_id'){final_head='Voucher/Booking ID';}else if(item==='date_requested'){final_head='Date requested';}else{final_head=item.replace(/_/g," ");final_head=final_head.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+final_head.slice(1).toLowerCase();}mainHead.push(final_head);});const paginatedData=getPaginatedData();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{border:"1",style:{width:"100%",background:"#FFF",marginTop:"10px",borderCollapse:"collapse"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{style:{background:"#3274b4",color:"#FFF"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:mainHead.map((col,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{padding:"8px"},children:col},index))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:paginatedData.map((item,idx)=>{console.log('item:',item);// DEBUG
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:columns.map(col=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{textAlign:"center",padding:"8px"},children:col==='created_at'||col==='created'||col==='flight_date'||col==='expires'||col==='date_requested'?formatDate(item[col]):col==='status'&&item[col]==='Confirmed'?'Scheduled':item[col]},col))},idx);})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:"10px",textAlign:"center"},children:Array.from({length:Math.ceil(data.length/itemsPerPage)},(_,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setCurrentPage(i+1),style:{margin:"0 5px",padding:"5px 10px",background:currentPage===i+1?"#3274b4":"#A6A6A6",color:"#FFF",border:"none",cursor:"pointer"},children:i+1},i))})]});};export default PaginatedTable;
